website_summaries.verdict: An expertly constructed and versatile booster seat that any parent is sure to appreciate.
pros: Delivers three layers of side impact protection
Steel frame and energy-absorbing base ensure unparalleled safety
Can hold a child starting at 25 lbs
Simple to change the seat height with the push of a button
cons: Can be tough to release the harness straps at times

customer_reviews.title: Nothing easy about this seat for us
customer_reviews.text: It us hard to install. The seat doesnt install well. The belt straps are hard to work with. Nothing easy about this seat for us. There is a need for better design than strapping a child by the crotch. It pinches, hurts the child, its ridiculously hard to get in and out.
customer_reviews.author: Ib

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS THE SEAT TO BUY
customer_reviews.text: Click right is the only way to go. Thurs is our third frontier, and only had to replace due to accidents. We had two of the pink polkadot ones before this, and they were more pushy than this new model. We love the ripples on the chest strap to keep it from sliding. My daughter has been in thurs carseat since she was 4. Shes 8, almost 9 weighs 71 and is 4'2". This seat is still very much comfortable and the 5pt will continue to fit for hopefully another year!
customer_reviews.author: AgH

customer_reviews.title: Will choose britax every time
customer_reviews.text: I am a long time fan of Britax car seats. I went through two other brands before discovering the clicktights. They are so easy to install. The steel frame is a must and the customer service has always been amazing. My son outgrew his previous britax and a britax booster was my immediate choice. As always, super easy to install. Easy to clean and my son seems very happy with how comfortable it is. He loves the cup holders, his own arm rests and that he sits a little higher and can see more. All around another excellent product from britax.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Do not discontinue this product! Works great for special needs children!
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't have enough room to write every good thing about this product. They should never have discontinued this model. Having a child with autism who easily un-clipe a standard shoulder strap while in a standard booster seat is scary. Being this unit works to 90lbs with the harness is such a beautiful thing. The padding is very comfortable. Lots of room and by far the easiest to install that I've ever seen. This thing is amazing in every way. Please do not discontinue this model!
customer_reviews.author: Scott G.

customer_reviews.title: My 6 year old loves her new seats
customer_reviews.text: I know these have been discontinued, so the review does not really matter. However, my daughter does love her new seats. She says they are comfortable and she feels like more of a big girl because it looks like its made for an older child (it is). She loves the cup holders. I found it easy to install (but I did have to read the manual to find the seatbelt path since it was different than any other seat that I have used, the whole section pops up).
customer_reviews.author: MomOfTwoAndMore

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, sturdy carseat
customer_reviews.text: I love this carseat! As a mom of four kids, I have owned several different carseats of various brands. Britax is the best, hands down. This car seat is a beast. It is big and kind of heavy. But I love that. It feels rock solid and is obviously built above the minimum government standards. I have owned cheap carseats that are flimsy and are literally made out of flexible plastic that did not leave me confident that they would hold up in a car accident. The Britax Pinnacle doesn't leave me worried like that. Also, the click tight feature makes it incredibly easy to install properly. I love this carseat!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worth the extra money. This not only feels sturdy, it is one of the easiest carseats to install EVER. It is also extremely comfortable. The only thing that was a negative, and not enough to affect my rating, is the cup holders are a bit on the small side. If you use the Camelbak kids Eddy it will fit, but you'll need to put a crumpled napkin in the bottom or your child won't be able to get the drink out on their own.
customer_reviews.author: R W

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!!!
customer_reviews.text: It's a britax so it is heavy but that is a known fact. It is really solid and sturdy and well worth the money. My son likes it a lot better than his britax advocate. He says it was bigger for him and he just loves the cup holder. He said he is really a big kid in it.

customer_reviews.title: HUGE
customer_reviews.text: Size is huge!!!!! Does not fit well in 2013 Ford Explorer, and I could never tighten the darn thing with the middle strap. Normally a Britax fan, but not this time. Returned item
customer_reviews.author: ali

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these and I love them. You can get them very tight in the vehicle. I’ve put them in 9 different kinds of cars and trucks and each tightens awesome. My boys are comfortable and love to go in them
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love.
customer_reviews.text: Our special needs son is 7.5 now and my love for Britax (this seat is my fav so far) just gets better each time!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole C.

customer_reviews.title: The absolute best car seat EVER.
customer_reviews.text: Wow. The easiest child sit to install ever. This is a must for parents and grand parents. So,simple that even grandma can handle this install. Throw out those other car seats and get yourself one of these TODAY.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Kalinowski

customer_reviews.title: Great seat
customer_reviews.text: Great seat. I have an older model I bought 4 years ago for my older daughter and now we bought this one. I like the comfort and security of a britax seat. My kids love the cup holds.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Semons

customer_reviews.title: We've owned this seat for over 2 years. My ...
customer_reviews.text: We've owned this seat for over 2 years. My child is 8 and it's a little too snug. I wish I could use it for longer. I have zero complaints.
customer_reviews.author: dezz

customer_reviews.title: Fits great!
customer_reviews.text: It installs great. It has a nice tight fit on the seatbelt. Seems to be constructed well.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install; child says it is very comfortable - even more comfortable than his Britax Advocate. Most crash impact protection on the market - I don't mess around when it comes to my child being safe! Also like the fact that it transitions later to a regular booster and has two cup holders.
customer_reviews.author: Amy N

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with this seat except I have noticed that the ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this seat except I have noticed that the straps are hard to tighten. My husband usually has to tighten them every few days so that my daughter is fastened safely. They don't loosen too quickly for us though.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Safety for my grandson
customer_reviews.text: Use for my grandson. Same as the one his parent's have in their cars (2). Very well made, easy to install (by professionals), and comfortable for him.
customer_reviews.author: Sweet Pea

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and Safe
customer_reviews.text: My son loves the comfort this has to offer (and the armrests/cup holders) , and we love the safety!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rosanna

customer_reviews.title: Great carseat/booster
customer_reviews.text: We got this once my daughter started to outgrow the Britax Advocate clicktight. It is just as sturdy and easy to install. We love it. Perfect for the next step.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Great design and easy install
customer_reviews.text: Love this design. Easy to install and not as bulky as our other carseat.
customer_reviews.author: Ey928

customer_reviews.title: Damaged and opened past return window.
customer_reviews.text: This came missing the latch system!!!! Unfortunately I inboxed it too late. Waited for child to grow. Now I’m out $300?
customer_reviews.author: CF

customer_reviews.title: Best car seat.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install with the new clip system, great color, easy to clean at the car wash, wide, and comfortable, I have used Britax for all my grand babies for the last 11 years and I know they safe.
customer_reviews.author: Louisa

customer_reviews.title: Great car seat
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, comfortable for my child, and very safe!
customer_reviews.author: W.O'Neal

customer_reviews.title: Harness
customer_reviews.text: Britax Pinnacle ClickTight G1.1 Harness-2-Booster Car Seat is a great product. I feel safe driving knowing that my toddlers are snugged in their seats
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy & comfortable for my Granddaughter!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter! She loves her new chair & I do too’ I feel she had a much safer ride! ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Sue E. Finley

customer_reviews.title: Big kids
customer_reviews.text: This is a great car seat especially for bigger kids Hes very comfortable in this seat
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny. Takes less than 5 mins to install correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: This seat is AWESOME! Easy for my child to get in and ...
customer_reviews.text: Worth its weight in gold! This seat is AWESOME! Easy for my child to get in and out of. Has the perfect amount of safety and comfort- well worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install. A bit wide, but great so far
customer_reviews.author: Nicolle

customer_reviews.title: Safe
customer_reviews.text: This carseat is great except it takes up so much space.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excent. Comfy for the kids. Peace of mind for the parents. 10 minutes to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I liked it. Seems like a little higher to climb up for babies.
customer_reviews.author: Wookeun Jeong

customer_reviews.title: The Hulk of boosters
customer_reviews.text: MADE OF STEEL 💪🏼 Frame/seat is SOLID I know my child will be safe in this. Very impressed with all the layers of impact. The fabric and cover is so soft. The cup holders and extra compartments are a huge plus. Installing is very simple. Worth every penny! Will always buy from britax and recommend this brand. 100%
customer_reviews.author: Cody and Itsell

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: This seat is very hard to tighten when the child is in the seat.
customer_reviews.author: caseycups

product_meta.title: Britax Pinnacle ClickTight Harness-2-Booster Car Seat, Venti [Discontinued]
product_meta.description: Safety, comfort and convenience make the Pinnacle ClickTight an exceptional Harness 2 Booster Seat. Car seat installation is easy as buckling a seatbelt thanks to the ClickTight Installation System. In the Pinnacle Harness 2 Booster Car Seat you are surrounded in safety. This booster seat features the patented Britax SafeCell Impact Protection system which includes a steel frame, energy absorbing base, V shaped tether to minimize seat rotation and staged release stitches that slow and reduce forward movement in the event of a crash. Britax designed the Pinnacle ClickTight Seat with three strong layers of side energy absorption; a deep foam lined shell, head protection, and external cushions will shield your child from the most severe type of collision. Two integrated cup holders keep drinks and snacks within reach and are easy to clean between rides. The 9 position quick adjust harness grows along with your child and it's easy to transition from a harness to a belt positioning booster by tucking the buckles and straps within the seat. The Pinnacle ClickTight Harness 2 Booster Seat can be used in Harness Mode for children 2 years old and 25 to 90 lbs. or in Booster Mode for children 40 to 120 lbs. Child standing height using the harness 30 58” and using booster mode 45 62”. Dimensions minimum 22.5 W x 28 H x 21 D, maximum 22.5 W x 36 H x 21 D inches. Seat width 12”. 9 Position harness slot heights 12.5” to 20.5”. Child Seated Shoulder Height Forward Facing Harness 12.5 20.5 inches. Child Seated Shoulder Height Booster 15 23 inches. May not be compatible with all vehicles, see user guide.
feature_bullets: Toddler to Big Kid: Easily transition from harness to belt positioning booster as your child grows
Easy installation: Patented ClickTight makes car seat installation as simple as buckling a seat belt
No rethreading, ever: Quick adjust 9 position harness with headrest for a comfortable, secure fit
Surrounded in safety: 3 layers of side impact protection, steel frame, impact absorbing base, and forward movement reducing v shaped tether
Fits: Forward facing harness mode 25 to 90 pounds, Booster mode 40 to 120 pounds; Maximum Dimensions: 22.5 W x 36 H x 21 D inches

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars64 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
